Central High Robotics team members construct a part for the competition robot.

h3.a: Board of Education Meeting this evening @ 7:00
Remote Learning Survey Is Now Available
Remote Learning Extended Until "at least May 15."

div.div: On April 16, Governor Murphy announced that New Jersey Schools will remain closed until "at least May 15." HVRSD will continue with remote learning until the State determines a return to school date. #StaystrongHopewellValley
Location: 425 S Main St, Pennington, NJ 08534, USA
